document.full_text: northern and southern sudanese representatives will meet on saturday to try to defuse tensions over the disputed abyei region, officials said, with just six weeks left before the south is set to secede.
document.title: north and south sudan to start abyei talks
lines_and_colors: northern and southern sudanese representatives will meet on saturday to try to defuse tensions over the disputed abyei region, officials said, with just six weeks left before the south is set to secede.
